changelogs.title: Uptime formatting + website version sync
changelogs.description: Humanized uptime across site and API; streamlined website version updates via changelog; clarified per-user prefix docs.
features: Changelog now updates website version only
improvements: Prefer max(bot uptime, server uptime) for accuracy
Netlify default uptime set to 0 to avoid stale
fixes: Netlify health uptime no longer stuck around ~50s
Removed server-wide %config prefix mention to reduce confusion

changelogs.title: Website uptime + prefix docs
changelogs.description: Humanized uptime (days/h/m/s) with accurate reporting, plus clarified per-user prefix docs and in-bot help.
improvements: Prefer max(bot uptime, server uptime) to avoid regressions
Default uptime set to 0 in Netlify stats store
Help: default % tip added to %prefix list
fixes: Uptime no longer stuck around ~50s in Netlify health
Removed server-wide %config prefix mention to avoid confusion

changelogs.title: Commands page refinements
changelogs.description: Improved category navigation and visibility behavior.
improvements: Counts and filters stay in sync
fixes: Fixed Roles section showing under other categories

changelogs.title: Commands page overhaul
changelogs.description: Redesigned commands explorer and categories for clarity.
improvements: Ensured All shows every command by default
fixes: Removed changelog command from website list

changelogs.title: Data System & Infractions Migration
changelogs.description: Centralized data handling and safe startup restore to keep environments consistent across servers and teammates.
features: Auto-restore infractions from infractions.json.backup on startup (only if empty)
Safer writes with directory checks across moderation commands
Tightened git hygiene (ignore data/, avoid committing sensitive files)
